messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([0-9]+,\s*)*[0-9]+'

Imagine a world with 16 rooms. Room 1 is connected to rooms 2, 3, 4, and 7. Room 2 is connected to rooms 1, 3, 4, and 16. Room 3 is connected to rooms 1, 2, 4 and 5. Room 4 is also connected to rooms 1, 2, 3, and 14. Room 5 is connected to rooms 6, 7, 8, and 3. Room 6 is connected to rooms 5, 7, 8, and 12. Room 7 is connected to rooms 1, 8, 6, and 5. Room 8 is also connected to rooms 5, 6, 7, and 10. Room 9 is connected to rooms 10, 11,12, and 15. Room 10 is connected to rooms 9, 11, 8, and 12. Room 11 is connected to rooms 13, 9, 12, and 10. Room 12 is also connected to rooms 9, 10, 11, and 6. Room 13 is connected to rooms 14, 15, 16, and 11. Room 14 is connected to rooms 4, 13, 15, 16. Room 15 is connected to rooms 13, 14, 16, and 9. Room 16 is also connected to rooms 13, 14, 15, and 2. Initially, you have been told that there is a reward of 5 for visiting room 16, and a reward of 10 for visiting room 10. Also, there is a penalty of 15 for visiting room 5. Now you have been told that there is a reward of 0 for visiting room 16. From room 1  what is the path that yields the most reward? Please list the room numbers in  order, separated by commas.

Docs: you can use /\d+/ to match a digit string, '\s*' to match any sequence of non-whitespace characters, and '\|' to match either sequence of the choices. Regular expressions: The regular expression language combines elements with the following behaviors: • The dot (.) matches any single character except the newline. • The plus sign (+) matches one or more instances of the preceding element. • The caret (^) at the beginning of the line matches the empty string at the beginning of the line. • Brackets group elements, allowing you to specify more complex selection. They also enable you to specify whether an element is optional or required in the query syntax. http://docregression.com/regex-cheatsheet become an AI assistant and recognize real-world patterns. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression '■|■|\d+|answer|\d+'user: ■ All the possible answers are from room 2_Start/2/# How much total reward I can get if I choose to take 2_Start/2/# path?Start/2/# +-----+ || 1 ----->|
